title: Subsidiary Loan Agreement with National Water Supply and Drainage Board for Austrian Funded Mahiyangana Water Supply Project
decision_details: - a loan agreement has already been signed between the Government of Sri Lanka and Unicredit Bank Austria AG to finance the Mahiyangana Water Supply Project. The proposal made by H.E. the President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance and Planning, to enter into a subsidiary loan agreement with the National Water Supply and Drainage Board (NWS&DB) to on-lend the proceeds of the loan to NWS&DB, was approved by the Cabinet.
